page.title: 17Transport in The Lee
page.content: With the exception of about half a mile of the A413 in the S.W. corner, all of the{roads}in this block are minor, some being single track country lanes with passing places. The{bus} service is part of the London Country Chiltern Link system. This connects The Lee & Lee Common with Great Missenden & Chesham, the 2 nearest shopping centres, & though there are buses every weekday, they are infrequent & the service finishes early in the evening. It follows that car ownership is almost universal, many families having two or more cars, enabling the many commuters who live in the area to reach the nearby {railway stations}at Gt. Missenden (British Rail), Chesham (London Transport) & Amersham (B.R. & L.T.) to travel to London to work.
